name: Glute Bridge
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground, hip-width apart.

2. Slowly lift your hips up towards the ceiling, squeezing your glutes at the top of the movement.

3. Lower your hips back down to the starting position without touching the floor, maintaining a slight arc in your lower back.

4. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, focusing on engaging your glutes and core muscles throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Glute Bridge is an isolation exercise that targets the gluteal muscles, performed by lifting the hips off the ground and squeezing the glutes at the top.
